<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To avoid the BP value clobbered by a function call, we need to choose a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// callee saved register to save the value. The &#96;last&#96; &#96;S&#96; register (s9) is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used for FP. So we choose the previous (s8) as BP.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a52c76c78d8c7899d21f8466677f676a9"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a52c76c78d8c7899d21f8466677f676a9">getBPReg</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoongArch::R31; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace LoongArchABI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
